title: 10 Best Places to go in Cincinnati
name: 10 Best Places to go in Cincinnati
description:
A Map by Sholtkam

These are, in my opinion, the top ten best places to go in Cincinnati.

properties.name: Cincinnati Zoo
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam3400 Vine Street, Cincinnati OHThis is a great place to go to see all kinds of different animals. The Cincinnati Zoo is not only open in the summer, but in the winter as well for the Festival of Lights.

properties.name: Graeters
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam2145 Reading Rd, Cincinnati, OHGraeters is a popular ice cream parlor in Cincinnati. Like Skyline, Graeters is only located within a small radius of Cincinnati.

properties.name: Great American Ball Park
properties.description: Posted by SholtkamcincinnatiThis is an amazing place to spend summer days/nights watching the Cincinnati Reds play baseball.

properties.name: Kings Island
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam6300 Kings Island Dr, Mason, OHKings Island is the best place to go in Cincinnati if you like roller coasters. It has over fifty rides and attractions, including the largest wooden roller coaster in the world (The Beast).

properties.name: Old Coney Amusement Park
properties.description: Posted by SholtkamCincinnati has one of the largest circulating pools in the world and Coney Island is one of them. This is a great place to spend summer days laying out by the pool

properties.name: Omnimax Theater
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam 1301 Western Ave, Cincinnati, OHCincinnati\'s omnimax theater has a five-story wrap around screen. Because of this, you feel like you are actually a part of the movie that you are watching.

properties.name: Paul Brown Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam1 Paul Brown Stadium, Cincinnati, OHThis is a great place to watch the Cincinnati Bengals play during football season.

properties.name: Riverbend Music Center
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam 6295 Kellogg Ave., Cincinnati, OHRiverbend Music Center is the perfect place to go for concerts. You can either buy tickets for the pavillion or watch the concert on the lawn. Many popular music acts perform here (like Tom Petty!).

properties.name: Riverdowns Racetrack
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkamcincinnati, ohRiverdowns is a place you can go if you like to bet on horses or if you just simply like to watch races. Riverdowns is a fun place to go, but can be addicting as well!

properties.name: Skyline Chili
properties.description: Posted by Sholtkam4588 Montgomery Rd, Norwood, OHCincinnati is known for its mouth-watering chili. Skyline Chili is the most popular chili parlor in Cincinnati. Skyline restaurants are only located within an one hundred mile radius of Cincinnati.
